testcase.classname: Context menu items are custom additions that appear in the right-click menu. Right-click in the box to trigger a JavaScript alert.
testcase.name: Right-click in the box to trigger a JavaScript alert.
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the website home page....................................passed When user clicks on Context Menu............................................passed And user right-click on the box.............................................passed Then JavaScript alert is displayed..........................................passed And user clicks okay on the JavaScript alert button.........................passed
